question: What are the names of disaster projects advertised before 2023
raw_answer: Latigo Canyon Road Culvert Repairs, Encinal Canyon Road Drainage Improvements, Outdoor Warning Sirens, Birdview Avenue Improvements, Guardrail Replacement Citywide, Corral Canyon Road Bridge Repairs, Vehicle Protection Devices, Malibu Road Slope Repairs, Broad Beach Road Water Quality Infrastructure Repairs, Corral Canyon Culvert Repairs, Clover Heights Storm Drain, PCH Median Improvements Project, PCH Signal Synchronization System Improvements Project, Civic Center Stormwater Diversion Structure
